name: markdown-color-plus
description: Additional Colorization for Markdown Files (background color of code, invisible line breaks, and current section headers)

markdown-color-plus.fencedCodeBlock.back.markdownDescription: Enable coloring the background of fenced code blocks
CSS color for background of fenced code blocks on light themes
CSS color for background of fenced code blocks on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.indentedCodeBlock.ba.markdownDescription: Enable coloring the background of indented code blocks
CSS color for background of indented code blocks on light themes
CSS color for background of indented code blocks on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.inlineCode.backgroun.markdownDescription: Enable coloring the background of inline code
CSS color for background of inline code on light themes
CSS color for background of inline code on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.blockquote.style.lin.markdownDescription: CSS color for background of blockquotes on light themes
CSS color for background of blockquotes on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.blockquote.style.tex.markdownDescription: CSS font style (normal, italic, etc.) of blockquote text

markdown-color-plus.blockquote.style.sym.markdownDescription: CSS color for background of blockquote symbols on light themes
CSS color for background of blockquote symbols on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.horizontalRule.style.markdownDescription: Enable coloring the background of horizontal rules
CSS color for background of horizontal rules on light themes
CSS color for background of horizontal rules on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.invisibleLineBreak.b.markdownDescription: Enable highlighting invisible line breaks (2 spaces at the end of a line)
CSS color for invisible line breaks (2 spaces at the end of a line) on light themes
CSS color for invisible line breaks (2 spaces at the end of a line) on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.strikethrough.decora.markdownDescription: Enable strikethrough decoration of text between strikethrough markers
Opacity of text between strikethrough markers

markdown-color-plus.currentHeaders.backg.markdownDescription: Enable highlighting of headers for current cursor position
CSS color of headers for current cursor position on light themes
CSS color of headers for current cursor position on dark themes

markdown-color-plus.delays.activeEditorC.markdownDescription:
Millisecond delay between switching editors and updating background colors.

*If experiencing issues with the editor background colors not being set or disappearing shortly after an editor is made visible, increasing this delay should help.*

markdown-color-plus.delays.editTextChang.markdownDescription:
Millisecond delay between changing text in a document and updating background colors.

*Increasing this delay will reduce how often the extension loops through the document to update background colors, which could be beneficial if you work on very large markdown documents or have a slower workstation.*
